default: ^This is the default knot, we should not be reading this in game
a: ^I'm here to sell my staff... It's a little old, but well cared for. I assure you, it'll fetch a good price!

c-0: ^Hah! Silly, some things don’t need explaining. You’ll understand the moment you lay eyes on it.
c-1: ^Oh ho! That’s not something you ask a lady! Just because it’s old doesn’t mean it’s lost its sparkle!

b: ^Right right, that’ll do nicely. Thank you, my dear, I may just come by again sometime!
c: ^Oh no no no… that won’t do. I’m not letting this beauty go for pocket change. Nice try, little toadstool!
d: ^That won’t do, little toadstool. You don’t have that kind of money. I’ll just flutter away and sell my treasures elsewhere!
e: ^The magic may have faded a little, but this antique still holds its worth, bud!
f: ^That won’t do, little one. There’s a better offer waiting somewhere, I’m sure.
g: ^No, no... this isn’t it. You must’ve made a mistake, little mushbrain! I’ll be back when you’ve regained your senses.
i: ^Right right it may have lost a bit of magic over the ages. Alright then, that’ll do nicely. Thank you, my dear, I may just come by again sometime!
